source.generate: SCHEMA: consttable1(cc) consttable2(cc, ac, city) INSTANCE: consttable1(cc: "44") consttable2(cc: "44", ac: "131", city: "EDI")

target.generate: SCHEMA: cust(cc, ac, name, street, city, zip) INSTANCE: cust(cc: "44", ac: "131", name: "Mike", street: "Mayfield", city: "NYC", zip: "EH4 8LE") cust(cc: "44", ac: "131", name: "Rick", street: "Crichton", city: "NYC", zip: "EH4 8LE")

scenario.dependencies:
ExtEGDs: cust(cc: $cc, ac: $ac1, name: $name1, street: $street1, city: $city1, zip: $zip), cust(cc: $cc, ac: $ac2, name: $name2, street: $street2, city: $city2, zip: $zip), consttable1(cc: $cc) -> $street1 == $street2.
cust(cc: $cc, ac: $ac, name: $name1, street: $street1, city: $city1, zip: $zip1), consttable2(cc: $cc, ac: $ac, city: $city2) -> $city1 == $city2.
